message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This offers a reasonable share while considering the potential decrease in value due to inflation.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share, but I think 40 is a fair amount considering the initial value of the money.
Considering the inflation impact, I propose a 50/50 split. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the reduced value of the money compared to previous rounds.
